article_title: Who Will Say No to Private Option? (Feedback)
article_text: During the last session, key Republican legislators put aside their dislike of Obamacare to craft a unique way to accept federal dollars to provide health insurance to Arkansans who desperately need it: the “private option.” Thank you, Sens. Sanders, Dismang and Burris. Thank you, Rep. Murdock and others who worked behind the scenes to make Arkansas a health care innovations model for the nation.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news

article_summary:
During the last session, key Republican legislators put aside their dislike of Obamacare to craft a unique way to accept federal dollars to provide health insurance to Arkansans who desperately need it: the “private option.” Thank you, Sens.
Thank you, Rep. Murdock and others who worked behind the scenes to make Arkansas a health care innovations model for the nation.
Sanders, Dismang and Burris.
